name: ***Python        ball game
body:
Build with Python 2.7

Description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A very basic user-interactive ball game.


Installation:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the .zip file and extract its content to  a specific folder.
2. Open  Image_file.txt. A link is provided.Download all the image file from that link.
   Place all the image file together in the same directory as Ball_game.py
3. Open Software_Installtion.txt .Download link for Python 2.7 and pygame is provided.
4. After installation of the software , run the file Ball_game.py

In case any error is showing up ,you can mail me at saptarshi.ghosh9@gmail.com

**Note:**
This is a basic version.Will soon upload the modified version.

Thank you
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
